forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. Thunder is possible late. High 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain this morning...then scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
